com.xorprogramming.io

Class LowMemoryBitmapFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xorprogramming.io.LowMemoryBitmapFactory

  • public class LowMemoryBitmapFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory used to efficiently load bitmaps.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Steven Roberts
    See Also:
    BitmapFactory

    • Method Detail

      • getScaledImage

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap getScaledImage(android.content.res.Resources res,
                                     int id,
                                     int width,
                                     int height,
                                     boolean higherQuality)
        Create a scaled bitmap of the given resource
        Parameters:
        res - Resource used for retrieving the resource
        id - The resource id of the images
        width - Required width of the bitmap
        height - Required height of the bitmap
        higherQuality - If true, the bitmap will be 32-bit and dithered. If false, the bitmap will be 16 bit and not dithered
        Returns:
        The scaled image

      • getUnscaledImage

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap getUnscaledImage(android.content.res.Resources res,
                                       int id,
                                       int width,
                                       int height,
                                       boolean higherQuality)
        Create a bitmap of the given resource. The bitmap will be the same size as the image.
        Parameters:
        res - Resource used for retrieving the resource
        id - The resource id of the images
        width - Used to determine the sampling size of the resource. This is not the width of the returned bitmap
        height - Used to determine the sampling size of the resource. This is not the height of the returned bitmap
        higherQuality - If true, the bitmap will be 32-bit and dithered. If false, the bitmap will be 16 bit and not dithered
        Returns:
        The unscaled image

      • getUnscaledImage

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap getUnscaledImage(android.content.res.Resources res,
                                       int id,
                                       boolean higherQuality)
        Create a bitmap of the given resource. The bitmap will be the same size as the image.
        Parameters:
        res - Resource used for retrieving the resource
        id - The resource id of the images
        higherQuality - If true, the bitmap will be 32-bit and dithered. If false, the bitmap will be 16 bit and not dithered
        Returns:
        The unscaled image
